Package com.here.android.mpa.customlocation

This package provides classes and interfaces that support custom location searches.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Request.ResultListener
    Represents a listener that reports information about the completion of a custom location search Request.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AreaGeometryRequest
    Represents a custom geometry search request that uses a bounding box to retrieve user-defined geometries.
    AreaRequest
    Represents a custom location search request that uses a bounding box to retrieve user-defined locations.
    AttributeRequest
    Represents an attribute search request for retrieving user-defined custom locations.
    CorridorRequest
    Represents an corridor custom location search request to retrieve user-defined locations previously stored using one or more search filter(s).
    CustomAttribute
    CustomAttribute representing an attribute field-value pair to be used as a Request filter or to be returned as part of the Request's Result.Location.
    CustomQueryBuilder
    An utility class to construct a query on custom attribute parameter(s), applying one or more conditions.
    IdGeometryRequest
    Represents a custom geometry search request that uses a geometry ID to retrieve the user-defined geometry.
    PointGeometryRequest
    Represents a custom geometry search request that uses a set of coordinates to retrieve user-defined geometries.
    ProximityRequest
    Represents a custom location search request that uses the area around a location to retrieve user-defined locations.
    QueryBuilder
    An utility class to construct a query of standard attribute(s), applying one or more conditions.
    Request
    Represents a custom location search request for retrieving user-defined locations or custom geometries.
    Result
    Result stores the user-defined locations or geometries retrieved from a Request.
    Result.Geometry
    Location specifies a user-defined geometry.
    Result.LineStringGeometry
    Location specifies a user-defined line string geometry.
    Result.Location
    Location specifies a user-defined location.
    Result.MultiLineStringGeometry
    Location specifies a user-defined multi line string geometry.
    Result.MultiPointGeometry
    Location specifies a user-defined multi point geometry.
    Result.MultiPolygonGeometry
    Location specifies a user-defined multi polygon geometry.
    Result.PointGeometry
    Location specifies a user-defined point geometry.
    Result.PolygonGeometry
    Location specifies a user-defined polygon geometry.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    QueryBuilder.Attribute
    Contains all the attributes name can be used within the query.
    QueryBuilder.Condition
    Contains all the conditions can be used within the query.
    QueryBuilder.Operation
    Contains all the operations can be used within the query.
    Request.Error
    Represents values describing possible search request errors.

Package com.here.android.mpa.customlocation Description

This package provides classes and interfaces that support custom location searches.

The following types of search are available:

  • Proximity - Search for user-defined locations around a specified point
  • Area - Search for user-defined locations within a specified bounding box
  • Corridor - Search for all user-defined locations within a distance along an isoline route
  • Attribute - Search for all user-defined locations that match query parameters for standard or custom attributes

To perform a search, create a request of the desired search type and execute the request. For example, to create a Proximity request: 

     ProximityRequest request = new ProximityRequest(100, new GeoCoordinate(11.11, 11.11), 100);
     request.execute(new ResultListener() { ... });

For more information on how to use this feature, please see the "Custom Locations" section in the HERE SDK for Android Developer's Guide
